A fully-furnished alpine chalet in Calabogie peak village by Calabogie Lake is looking for short-term rental (1 month minimum).

1-hr west of Ottawa, our Alpine Chalet is a four-season vacation home sitting on a 1-acre treed lot with a panoramic view of the Calabogie Peak Ski hill. The boat launch dock on Calabogie Lake shared by our community is 600 meters away.

Nested in a recreational area with close proximity to various activities, our chalet offers modern conveniences. The 1,750 sqf living space includes a well-equipped kitchen with open-concept living room and dinning room centered by a wood-burning fire place, and a sun-soaked extra-wide deck off the 2nd floor. Water-purification system, on-site laundry, dish washer, BBQ, outdoor fire-pit are also provided.
Well-behaved dogs are welcome.
Things you can do (distance from our property):

column2: Calabogie lake, Boating, fishing and winter ice fishing (600 meters to the boat launch point)
Madawaska Nordic Ski and Recreational Trail Network (200 meters)

18,1516772385.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-short-term-rental/ottawa/lease-takeover:-cool-2-bdrm-1-bath-on-bank-and-catherine/1516772385,"527 Bank St, Ottawa, ON K2P 1Z5, Canada",ontario,45.4096985,-75.69204289999999,1300.0,,"Hi there,

I'm looking for a responsible tenant who would pass a credit check (and reference check) to takeover my lease. You would have to pay Oct 1 to my landlord and 1300$ to me (because I have already paid last month's rent).

Photos: in the photo you see the large bedroom and the kitchen. The other part of the kitchen is a tiny seating area for dining/lounging. The main bedroom photographed is big. Maybe 11x13? Tall ceilings. There's also a second bedroom but I use it as an office or a guest room. It can only fit a twin size bed for guests and a small desk. The closet for that bedroom is outside the room. There's also a cute hallway. I'll update more photos at the end of August.

I will be able to provide showings over the month of September, so please message me for viewings on the first week of September. I would like to confirm a tenant and have them confirmed by my landlord by the end of the second week of September.
Worst case scenario, I would accept a subletter to enter a contract directly with me, but I would prefer someone take over my lease.

The location is insane, and there are condos propping up everywhere around my apartment building. The building itself is super old, but I'm sure I have the nicest unit in the property. Bathroom is new, the whole place is newly painted and has new flooring. Absolutely no pest issues and super clean (inside my unit). New stove and oven (i'm the first one to use it). There is great heating but no air-conditioning.
There is laundry in the building, but it's really basic and old looking.",Yes,1,2,Owner,Yes,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

    WIFI:

    5 Reasons why our apartments are out of this world:

    1--LIGHTING!

    Our ceiling bulbs are LIFX and so this means you can control the color and ambiance in every room.

    We also included LIFX Beams in everyroom which enable you to have a self-controlled ambiance.

    Our lighting solution is app based which means you're enabled to controlled the lighting experience and mood in every room.

    2--SUPER FAST INTERNET!

    Each apartment receives their own modem/router. The speed is 1G Download and 500MB Upload.

    Our internet service provider is ROGER'S and we chose the best available package for speed and data, that is available in the market.

    3--LOCATION!

    We are a stones throwaway from the largest grocery store in all of downtown Ottawa.

    We are a footsteps away from the beautiful Parliament Hill.

    We are 10 min on FOOT away from University of Ottawa.

    4--DESIGN!

    Our finishes make up of stainless steel through out the entirety of the apartment with a deep black wood flooring, accompanied by white carrera granite counters and walls in the bathroom, with tints of chrome along the glass shower doors.

    Our kitchens include carrera white granite counters along with Stainless steel SEKTION cabinets.

    Our living rooms are furnished with Tom Dixon designed Delaktig furniture.

    5--SERVICE!

    We are a very hands on landlord and believe in high-touch service.

    Our building contains security cameras and FOB keys which means neighbors can't share passcodes to get in!

    Our concierge desk will be filled with staff 9 hours a day, and in addition, an onsite supervisor for the building will be living there to help troubleshoot issues if anything arises 24/7.

    We believe our apartments will be superior in design and customizable lighting experiences compared to what else is available in the Ottawa Downtown landscape.

    To book a viewing please email us or visitsmartlivingproperties.ca/rental-options and click ""Book Tour""

100,1505771279.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/2103-199-slater-street-furnished-studio-apartment-for-rent/1505771279,"199 Slater Street, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0C8",ontario,45.419931,-75.698955,1650.0,,"

Comfortable, furnished one bedroom studio on the 21th floor of the well-located 199 Slater condo building. The building This gorgeous building with its striking, mid-century modern look combines condo apartments with the sought-after Alt Hotel and its street-level bar and high-end foodie take-out. The condo features a 5th floor outdoor terrace with downtown views, and the condo's amenities include a gym, a theatre room, a banquet room and lounge, an outdoor summer hot tub, and a billiards room. It has clean, carpeted hallways and two fast, big elevators. The apartment This apartment is a condominium unit (not a hotel suite) located high above the street on the 21floor. It has a wide south view, a decent-sized bedroom, two closets, nice big windows, a nice bathroom with glass-enclosed shower, and comes fully equipped with washer-dryer, microwave, fridge, stove, and dishwasher, plus bike parking and storage locker. It is tastefully painted, decorated, and well-furnished with a double bed, table and chairs, couch, practical living room furniture including a fold-up coffee table, flat screen TV, and fully equipped (kitchenware, pots and pans, linens, coffee maker, kettle, iron and ironing board, good curtains). The apartment is perfect for a single person or a couple. The location If you've always wanted or need to be downtown, this is a great place to be. The condo is steps away from Bank and Sparks Streets. Within your block, there is a Starbucks, a bubble tea place, a bookstore, a sushi place, a Bridgehead, a Think Lunch, a Caribbean eatery and a Tim Horton. Within the next block you have a Shoppers Drug Mart, Eggspectation Restaurant for brunch, the Royal Oak pub, the Blurry Pixel, a bakery with good bread and croissants, and the World Exchange Plaza. You are within a few blocks of two grocery stores (Sobeys [with beer] and Massine's Independent Grocer), two LCBO's, restaurants, shops of all kinds, bars and clubs, and much much more. And within a 12-minute walk, you have the Byward Market, Rideau Street, Rideau Centre, University of Ottawa, DND, the NAC, and all of downtown. Transport The building is steps away from the subway (Parliament Station, to open November 2018). Frequent bus service on Bank Street (OC Transpo) and Wellington Street (OC Transpo and STO). Bank Street Transitway Station across the street (until the subway opens). If you have a car, parking may be rented separately or nearby. Rent Your rent includes everything: internet, hydro, heat, water. You only pay the rent: $1,800 /month. Non-smokers, no pets. References required, first and last month rent deposit upon signing. Minimum 1 Year.

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

The Balmoral is what you've been waiting for.
It's all in the details. Every inch of your suite has been professionally designed with convenience and luxury at the forefront. Enjoy an evening of mesmerizing views on your large balcony or entertain your guests around your island kitchen. In-suite laundry provides you with convenience and central air-conditioning provides you with the comfort you expect. The sile stone countertops, LED lighting, and four stainless steel appliances give the designer kitchens vibrancy and style, while the engineered hardwood flooring helps tie the decor together, providing you with the absolute best that Ottawa has to offer in a luxury rental suite. Suite sizes range from 765-1735Square Feet.

Stunning Amenities
As you drive up to the building, you will experience the fully manicured grounds and elegant fountain, establishing the class and sophistication of the property. Enjoy a workout in one of your two exercise facilities. Spend an evening on the rooftop terrace enjoying the outstanding 360-degree views, along with barbecues. An indoor swimming pool and steam room are conveniently available, along with a luxurious fully-equipped social lounge, library, tiered theatre room, business centre, storage lockers, bicycle storage, and billiards room.

Security features have also been given much attention. Enjoy individual floor access in your touchscreen elevator, as well as controlled access to underground parking, serviced by a car-wash.
Take a stroll along the Rideau River or visit the vibrant downtown nightlife. With the bustling Byward Market and Parliament closeby, the options are endless.

132,1516948337.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/newly-built-4-bedroom-units-close-to-carleton-ottawa-u/1516948337,"1045 Secord Ave, Ottawa, ON K1H 8C7, Canada",ontario,45.37895330000001,-75.6760775,695.0,,"NEWLY BUILT, ALL BRAND NEW!!

1043-1045 Secord is a new construction, luxury low rise 4 unit building designed specifically for students. These condos feature large bedrooms and bathrooms, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gleaming hardwood floors, and in-unit washer/dryers.

Easily walk or ride your bike to Carleton University and take advantage of living within close proximity to the Light Rail and Ottawa Transit Way with a short commute to University of Ottawa and Algonquin College. You can walk to the groceries, Billing Bridge Shopping Mall, Landsdown Park and many other businesses, restaurants and Cafes in Bank Street. If you’re in a hurry, or the weather is uncooperative, just walk less than 200 meters and take a short bus to anywhere you want.
Each unit has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a kitchen and a common living area. There is a free laundry in each unit and all utilities and ultra-fast fibre optic internet (1GB download) is included.
The smallest bedrooms are 110 sqf and the large bedrooms are 150sqf.
Ready to move in for September 2020.
The rental price varies from $695 to $795.
The rent includes:
Heat, Water, Hydro, Air Conditioning, Ultra-fast Internet, and Laundry (in the unit - non-coin operated)
Features include:
-High ceilings; large open-concept living room and kitchen
-Large Bedrooms with large window
-Modern kitchen with countertops
-Stainless Steel Appliances
-In unit Laundry; 2 large bathrooms with full tubs
- Common areas & kitchen is furnished
- Non-smoking environment
Excellent access to Transit:
-3 min walk from Heron transit way station (#10, #111 to Carleton U,#87,#97,#98 to UOttawa, #88 to Algonquin College);
-11 min bus to downtown Ottawa;
-7 min walk from Mooney's O-Train station;

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

Avalon Park offers a welcoming escape from the city with high-end amenities in a park-like setting, all just minutes from Elmvale Shopping Centre and Highway 417. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. Enjoy amenities like an outdoor pool, plenty of green space, a theatre room and much more.

SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Avalon Park has it all, location, convenience and high-end amenities.

Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

Call 613-454-5781 today to schedule your private tour.

149,1516330888.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/westboro-luxurious-custom-built-4-bdrm-3-5-baths-fin-bsmt/1516330888,"656 Melbourne Avenue, K2A 1X2, Ottawa, ON",ontario,45.3831194,-75.7508773,4600.0,,"656 Melbourne Avenue, Ottawa, ON K2A 1X2

This magnificent, recently constructed contemporary home has been built with the highest standards of luxury!!! Located in the heart of Westboro, this home is conveniently located near coveted features such as the trendy shops and restaurants of Westboro Village, Dovercourt Recreation Centre, the new LRT line, and within the catchment of highly rated schools.

Upon entering the bright and airy foyer from the large covered front porch, you will be impressed by this home’s spacious open concept floor plan. The main floor has hardwood floors with a mix of ceramic tile, recessed lighting, and 9′ ceilings throughout, along with custom built California shutters and built-in speakers. The generous sized living room is adjacent to the dining room, which features a stunning custom built coffered ceiling. The gourmet kitchen is spectacular with an oversized middle island and breakfast bar. The kitchen has an abundance of cupboard space, a walk-in pantry, upgraded quartz counters, stainless steel appliances, gas stove, built-in microwave, and a wine refrigerator. An eat-in area is adjacent to the breakfast bar with patio doors leading out to the deck. The kitchen overlooks the sunken family room, which features a beautiful craftsman style stone gas fireplace and ample windows with western exposure. This floor also has a 2-piece bathroom and a mudroom, which includes the laundry area and an access door to the backyard.

The second floor has hardwood floors throughout. The luxurious master bedroom has vaulted ceilings with a half moon window, a large walk-in closet, and an amazing 5-piece spa-inspired ensuite bathroom. It has a double soaker tub, a massive shower, and dual vessel sinks. This floor has an additional 3 bedrooms and another 4-piece bathroom.

The basement is completely finished and could be used as a full in-law suite. It has Berber carpets and recessed lighting throughout. There is a guest suite, family room, and a 3-piece bathroom along with additional storage space. The backyard is the true highlight of this house! This property is on an oversized lot and completely fenced in. It has a hot tub, deck, interlock patio, landscaped garden, shed, and single car garage.
This property comes with 7 appliances, central air conditioning, and central vac. It is available for September 1, 2020 for up to a 2+1 year lease.
No pets or smokers please.

This property is being professionally managed by Brigadier Management Limited. For additional information and pictures please visit our website at: https://www.ottawapropertymanagement.co/ or call us at 613-236-9898.",No,3.5,4,Professional,No,No,No,No,1 Year,3+,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,Yes,No,,,House,,,,

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Consider Artista Flats, located at 341 Flora St in Ottawa's Centretown neighbourhood, the solution for young professionals and students who desire the comforts of home, with the accessibility to the downtown core. Designed in modern and upscale style, the clean, spacious and comfortable Artista Flats is quickly becoming a sought after address for Ottawa's up-and-coming.

At Artista Flats we pride ourselves in providing everything the university student or young professional may need. Featuring renovated and pet friendly one-bedroom floor plan designs, Artista Flats is a place you'll be proud to call home.

Sitting a stroll away from the ultra-trendy Glebe and Elgin St area, Artista Flats is connected to businesses, government centres, schools, outdoor recreation, shopping, dining and entertainment. Conveniently located for students, Artista Flats is just a short walk to Carleton University and University of Ottawa. In short, you can have anything you want, and more!

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.  

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Relax in your spacious apartment with private balcony, floors above Gloucester and experience the satisfaction and convenience of living at 860 Blackthorne in Ottawa, ON! Ideally located near Highway 417 and Aviation Parkway, 860 Blackthorne offers not only easy access around town but to the big city delights of Ottawa as well.

GLOUCESTER OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood we also offer:

Newly renovated apartments with laminate flooring, modern kitchen cabinets, stainless steel appliances including dishwashers, private balconies and dazzling views of the city. Take in the beautiful scenery with several nearby parks and walking paths or enjoy the many nearby entertainment venues.

When you make your home at 860 Blackthorne, you gain access to all of the dining, shopping and entertainment choices Gloucester has to offer. We have five parks within minutes of our front entrance, several shopping malls to select from and even an outdoor ice skating rink down the road.

We invite you to view our floor plans and experience 860 Blackthorne for yourself. Call 613-518-1095 today for a tour!

Parkway Park is a beautiful apartment community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, surrounded by convenient amenities. Residents can enjoy updated suites, a central location near College Square and Algonquin College, direct access to the future Baseline Rd LRT station, and nearby Centrepointe park. Come visit us at Parkway Park!

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Parkway Park Apartments offers newly updated 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments and 3 bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy our vast green space, pet friendly apartments and 24 hour emergency services.

Our trendy Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways, bus stops and future LRT station gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. The Parkway Park community is just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Parkway Park Apartments has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Our trendy Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways, bus stops and future LRT station gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. The Parkway Park community is just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

239,1516857509.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/ottawa-barrhaven-:-shared-accommodations-townhouse/1516857509,"2 Madden Ct, Nepean, ON K2J 4L9, Canada",ontario,45.2875644,-75.7338528,630.0,,"Available for September 1st (or sooner, rent prorated depending on move-in date). The sooner the better but my priority is finding a compatible housemate.
Full-Time working male (60+ hours/week) seeking housemate to share 3 bedroom furnished* town house.
Available for August 1st, August 15th, or September 1st. Earliest date preferred.
* New coffee/end tables are ordered, waiting on delivery. You will need your own bedroom furnishings but there is an available queen size bed in the spare room that could be used temporarily.

Female preferred (cats are anxious around other males and I've always had a positive experience with female housemates, previous tenants will provide a recommendation if required). Although it is a 3 bedroom town house I am only interested in ONE adult to share the house with. You will have full access to the entire house, this is not a room-for-rent. My current housemate is moving out only to be closer to her family/work and she will provide a personal reference if required. I am very clean and keep to myself. There are also 2 cats that live with me or I guess you could say that I live with them! Due to this, the ad is listed as pet friendly but one additional cat would be the absolute maximum.

Please note: I will not be accepting the first qualified applicant and will be very thorough and selective with my decision. I feel it is very important to find someone compatible when it comes to sharing a house.

I am listing the rental amount at $630/month. This amount includes High Speed Internet (with Netflix!) and House Insurance (mandated by the landlord) but does NOT include Gas (Enbridge), Hydro (Ottawa Hydro), or Parking (if required). Hydro and Gas would be split 50/50 (estimates below). Outdoor parking is also available from the landlord (not me) at an additional rate of $45/month (it's actually $44/month until December).
Rental Breakdown (Estimated Bills)
Base Rent: $630
Enbridge Gas: $40-$70/month (split 50/50 = $20-$35 each)
Ottawa Hydro: $40-$70/month (split 50/50 = $20-$35 each)

• These amounts are estimates only and averages based off the previous year. This is to give you an annual estimate only. Some months may be much higher, some months may be much lower (heating in the winter, over all hot water usage, a/c units, laundry volume, etc). Your estimated monthly average would be in the $670 to $700/month range (+$45 if parking is required).

Only my name would be on the physical lease and utility bills but we would be signing both a Roomers and Boarders Agreement, along with a Roommate Agreement. I will provide signed receipts for rent and bills. I'm interested in a minimum of 1 year (longer preferred but not required) with month-to-month afterwards unless we agree to commit to another year. 60 days notice must be provided by either of us in order to terminate the tenancy agreement. Last month's rent (not including bills) will be required upon signing the agreement and first month's rent will be due upon move-in date (pro-rated daily if you move in mid-month).

• 3 Bedroom
• 2 Entrances
• 1.5 Bath (1 Full large bathroom upstairs + 1 toilet/sink downstairs)
• 90% furnished.
• Fridge, Stove, Microwave, Washer/Dryer (new).
• no dishwasher

• no central air-conditioning. You can install a window unit in your bedroom and/or living room but it will affect our Ottawa Hydro bill total in the summer months. I will still be splitting the bill 50/50 as I do have a window unit in my room and would benefit from any additional a/c units.
• Unfinished Basement.
• close to pretty much every type of store, walking distance to Farmboy, Gas Station, and Bus
• small playground in front of house
• smokers welcomed but NOT in the house, ever.

247,1516850233.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/fully-furnished-studio-in-centretown-available-oct-1-6-mth-min/1516850233,"429 Somerset St, K1A0A9, Ottawa, ON",ontario,45.414756,-75.6983554,1250.0,,"OVERVIEW
This studio is ready to go, set up with all your basic needs!
It has a generous galley eat-in kitchen, private outdoor patio, outdoor terrace that is shared with other tenants, along with natural gas BBQs, and a spacious bathroom!
DETAILS

The 600 sq feet offers a combined, large sleeping and living area, eat-in kitchen, spacious bathroom with tub, and your own, private laundry room with a dryer and washer, along with plenty of closet space in the front corridor.

We have fully furnished the entire apartment, and it comes with brand new Bosch washer and dryer, built-in closet with separate laundry, high-speed internet, air con, a brand new Bosch washer and dryer, plenty of towels and linens, Keurig coffee maker, silverware, stemware, and crockery to make sure you are as comfortable as can be!

The inside is not all this apartment has to offer, though. There’s also a private patio with a cafe-style table for eating outside when the weather’s good. We have lovely table clothes and linens to accompany your outdoor eating.
INCLUSIONS
Pretty much everything you could want!
SHARED SPACES

It’s not only the apartment, though; as a tenant of 429 Somerset, you’ll have access to the building’s outdoor terrace that has free, natural gas BBQs, secured bike storage, and a party room that can be booked for your parties and get togethers.
THE HOOD

Centretown is a great neighbourhood, with everything that you need at your fingertips! It has a vibrant, multicultural feel to it, and you can easily get to all that Ottawa has to offer, including the University of Ottawa (20 minutes on foot), the Parliament Buildings (15 minutes on foot), Byward Market (25 minutes on foot), and many other attractions!
There are also plenty of coffee shops, great restaurants, and the vibrant scene along Bank Street. You’re also only a hop, skip, and a jump away from China Town and Little Italy.
GETTING AROUND

The apartment is right near a major transit link on Bank St. Busses run along the street that link of up Ottawa’s transport network. Taking the bus is easy, and getting to and from the apartment is also pretty easy on bike or foot.
The building also offers parking for visitors, and there is a car rental just across the street, so you can pick up a car there and explore all that Ottawa and its environs has to offer.
IMPORTANT NOTES

column2: Neither pets nor smoking is permitted in the apartment

Bachelor/studio apartment for rent, in the basement of my private (family) residence, in quiet residential Ottawa neighbourhood, (near Alta Vista Drive and Pleasant Park Road).
Self-contained with private entrance; fully-equipped kitchen; full-size laundry washer and dryer also contained within apartment; (no more trips to the laundromat!)
Note: apartment can be provided either furnished or not; also, new flooring; and a new washer and dryer.
$740/month; rent includes all utilities: ie., heat, hydro (ie., electricity), water.
WiFi provided.
Available as of 1 Sep.
One-year lease; then two months notice for termination.
This is for single-person occupancy only (not coded for couples; no room mates)
Absolutely no sub-leasing.
Please email for an appointment to see if interested. No telephone calls, please. If you are reading this ad, the apartment is still available.
First class location:
- 30 seconds walk to No 44 and No 149 bus routes;
- 7 min walk to Pleasant Park Transitway Station;
- University of Ottawa: 45 min walk; or 10 min bus ride;
- Carleton University: 45 min walk; or 25 min bus ride;
- Ottawa General Hospital; Riverside Hospital; CHEO; all within 20 min walk.
- Close to Bank Street shopping (including Billings Bridge Mall) and Train Yards shopping centre.
Usual credit check, references, and proof of employment (or other steady income source) required. No exceptions. If you have problems with this, please don’t bother contacting me.)
Non-smokers only. (No exceptions)
Ideal for a mature university student, young professional, nurse, or medical intern/resident.

No on-site parking available; street parking technically a possibility, but this has proved problematic to previous tenants -- parking tickets have been regularly issued for long term stays -- especially in the winter. In other words, this is not really an apartment for someone with a car.
First month’s rent is required on signing the lease; last month is required on taking possession.

Note: If you are wondering if it’s pet-friendly, I believe the answer is no. I have nothing against pets (I have a Husky-Shepherd dog, myself), but I believe the apartment is too small for dogs, and I don’t think my dog and a cat will mix very well.     5 Reasons why our apartments are out of this world:

    1--LIGHTING!

    Our ceiling bulbs are LIFX and so this means you can control the color and ambiance in every room.

    Our lighting solution is app based which means you're enabled to controlled the lighting experience and mood in every room.

- Central air conditioning
- Central vacuum
- Window blinds included

- Flexible on move-in. Home is vacant and available for immediate occupancy
- No smoking or vaping
- No pets
- Utilities, wifi, home phone and cable are not included
- Property maintenance arrangements to be discussed (gardens, grass, snow removal)
- To schedule a viewing appointment please Email: rossrental2020@gmail.com

Centretown offers residents a variety of amenities including, popular restaurants, trendy shops, local cafes, museums and city parks just minutes from their doorstep. Enjoy nearby well-known locations like Carleton University, Elgin Street, University of Ottawa, Parliament Hill and ByWard Market.

Come discover 225 MacLaren and celebrate a city vibrant lifestyle!

Only seconds away from Elgin Street and Bank Street, youll appreciate the convenience of having stylish shops, trendy restaurants, and the wonderful sights and sounds of the city at your fingertips.

Situated only seconds from Highway 417 (Metcalfe Avenue exit), and next to several convenient OC Transpo bus stops, youll be able to access any part of Ottawa within minutes. This luxury heritage apartment has some of the best views of Ottawa and the Rideau Canal from every corner of the building its picture perfect!

The Tiffany Apartments have suites designed for all types of people; bachelors, one-bedroom apartments, and two-bedroom apartments each with hardwood floors throughout. Every unit is designed to maximize space with open-concept rooms each with large, bright windows.

Only one block away is a Loblaws grocery store, an LCBO, and the Beer Store. Youll also enjoy having easy access to the citys most entertaining district with Elgin Streets pubs, restaurants, and shops.

504,1516696620.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/arbor-village-1196-shillington-avenue:-apartment-for-rent/1516696620,"1196 Shillington Avenue, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 8L4",ontario,45.3811739,-75.7273958,1599.0,,"Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options. 

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 1196 Shillington, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our recently renovated 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, updated countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites are ideal for students, couples, young professionals and retirees who are looking for a quiet place to call home with easy access to amenities and attractions..

1196 Shillington is steps from Ottawa's Experimental Farm where you can enjoy beautiful gardens, paths and more. The building's close proximity to Carling Ave and Merivale Rd provides for access to numerous public parks, shopping, grocery, medical facilities and schools. Highway 417 is a short drive away and public transportation is just steps from your front door.

The Rideau Canal is a beautiful walk or short drive away where you can find waterside restaurants and cafes. 1196 Shillington is conveniently located between Carleton University and Algonquin College, great for students looking for a quick and easy commute to campus.

Welcome to 218 MacLaren in Centretown Ottawa. Located just around the corner from trendy Elgin Street and all the shops, dining and entertainment it provides, as well as centrally located in the Golden Triangle. We offer relaxed living in the heart of downtown Ottawa!

CENTRETOWN OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Besides one of the best addresses in downtown living, 218 MacLaren also provides:

Bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments. Newly painted apartments with laminate floors, convenient parking, and on-site laundry facilities.

At 218 MacLaren, your options are endless. Best of all is that everything you need is within walking distance from our front doors. Public transportation is a few steps away and Highway 417 is easily accessible. Parking is also available for those requiring space for a vehicle. If our central location isn't enough, our bachelor and one bedroom apartments feature such high-end amenities as new laminate flooring, two appliance kitchens and some of the best city views found in Ottawa.

Modern, spacious, 3 bed, 2,5 bath townhouse with a garage for rent in Barrhaven. This is a family-friendly community near the shopping plaza with many stores, a community recreation complex and the transit terminal serving all major bus lines is only a 5 minutes walk.

This townhome comes with hardwood floors on the main floor, an open concept kitchen with all major stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, light fixtures, and pot lights. The main floor is equipped with a powder room.

The second floor consists of a master bedroom and an ensuite bathroom with a Roman tub and separate shower. The other 2 bedrooms can accommodate a queen-size bed and come with large closets. There is another full bathroom on second floor.
The basement is fully finished. There are a 1-year-old washer and dryer in the mechanical room and a separate room with extra storage space.
The home is equipped with a gas-fired furnace, tankless water heater, and central AC.
Rent is 2190 per month. Tenants are responsible for all utilities (gas, hydro, water, and the internet, tenancy insurance) as well as lawn cutting and snow removal.
Minimum one-year lease, last month's rent is required.
All rental applications will be subject to a reference and background check. No smoking, no parties.

Detailed Property Information

Clarendon Lanes is a hidden gem, waiting to be discovered by those who appreciate comfort, style and the freedom to explore their surroundings. Choose from unfurnished or furnished apartments for rent.

Live in the heart of Ottawa's most exciting and distinguished neighbourhood, the ByWard Market, where your apartment for rent in Ottawa at Clarendon Lanes is steps from the city's best restaurants, galleries and shopping.

This modern development was completed in 2003 and offers everything you would want in a luxury apartment. Its coveted location and service-focused attitude create an inclusive neighbourhood that allows you to make the most of your days and evenings in Ottawa. Relax and unwind in the comforts of our furnished or unfurnished apartment rentals. Clarendon Lanes suites are spacious, bright, cozy and rich in architectural detail. Our suites offer you the very best in comfort and appeal with attractive granite countertops, solid maple cabinetry and central air conditioning for those warm summer nights.

In addition to unfurnished Bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent, we also offer short term furnished rentals. We can look after all your corporate housing, furnished apartment, temporary short term housing and short term rental needs in Ottawa.

If you're looking for something beyond the ordinary look no further than our two-storey penthouse apartments that include natural gas fireplaces for chilly Ottawa winters and a private terrace for beautiful Ottawa summers.

Unfurnished suites' rental rates do not include hydro. Furnished suites require 3 month lease. For shorter term, contact us at Sussex House.

3 bedroom or 2 bedroom plus den apartment in Elmvale Acres/Alta Vista! The main floor of a bungalow, this apartment has a kitchen with stainless steel fridge, stove and dishwasher, beautifully refinished hardwood floors, updated bath, large living room with a big picture window and dining area. Never wait for the laundry again with your own washer and dryer. Central Air. Enjoy the backyard in the summer.1 outside parking spot included in the rent.

Minutes to the Ottawa General Hospital and CHEO. Easy commute to University of Ottawa and Carleton University. Just down the street from Arch and Sainte Genevieve public schools as well as the Canterbury Recreational Complex. Catch the bus right outside your front door on Pleasant Park. Convenient shopping and restaurants are also close by.

This is an amazing, newly constructed, open concept 2 bedroom with a modern kitchen and bathroom. It is located in a great neighbourhood on a quiet street in Orleans and it is close to everything! The Hwy is a 2 minute drive away, groceries, restaurants, gym, Ray Friel Park and rec complex are a 2 minute walk away and main bus route is at the end of the street! This place is available for October 1. You want a place where you will be proud to call home, this is it!

This place has huge windows and a ton of natural light! The master bedroom is large and bright and has a ginormous closet. The second bedroom is also quite large with a great size closet, perfect for a spare room or your own office. Imagine having a private guest bedroom for visiting friends or family.

You’ll be the envy of all your friends with this kitchen! Modern, open concept, pot lights and under cabinet lighting! Are you kidding me!! Who doesn’t want stainless appliances? French door fridge, modern hood fan, flat top stove, microwave and even a dishwasher, imagine never doing dishes again! All these are included and yours to enjoy!

Soaker tub! This bathroom is to die for! Beautiful tiled floors, a large tube to soak your day a way and a double vanity, imagine not having to fight for the sink. Yup, your friends are going to be, jealous!

A large deck off the kitchen leads to a huge fenced in backyard with a shed for extra storage. Take advantage of the beautiful summer weather BBQing, hanging out and enjoying your precious down time. This place is perfect to reconnect with your friends and family, hosting dinner parties and BBQ’s. This unit has been renovated from top to bottom, you will not be disappointed!
Never do laundry with your neighbours again!! Your own washer and dryer (that doesn’t eat your change) are provided and are yours to enjoy.

Your girlfriend is hot! Yup, got that covered too! This home of course comes with high efficiency central air conditioning. The summer is great but it’s also nice to be comfortable and get a great sleep.
Parking? No issue with parking, lots of room for 2 cars in the driveway and lots of street parking for any visitors.

All INCLUSIVE with nothing else to pay!! Heat, hydro, water and parking are all included. I’m even including the Bell Fibe wireless complete home package!! Seriously?!!! You get the fastest internet available (940 mb/s) which is ridiculously stupid fast and of course unlimited. You will also get the premium Tv package. WHAT?!! Oh ya, you will even get an HD PVR to be able to record, rewind and replay whatever you want!!!

This main floor unit is located in a duplex at 382 Leanne St. It has been fully renovated with a contemporary design; it is legal, safe and soundproofed. $2097/month, credit and reference checks will be done on qualified applicants and the lease duration is 1 year. I think it’s pretty obvious that it won’t last long! It has 3 bedrooms plus a loft, as well as 2 full bathrooms and 1 powder room. The house contains large windows that bring in lots of natural sunlight throughout the day. The main floor contains hardwood flooring, all light fixtures, pot lights, and an open concept kitchen. The kitchen includes high-end Quartz countertops, a powerful hood fan, and all brand-new stainless-steel appliances. The laundry room is conveniently located on the top floor and includes high-end Samsung washers and dryers. There is parking space for 3 cars: 1 in the garage and 2 in the driveway.

This house is located in a family-friendly community, surrounded by nature with the Jock River and various trails being steps away. With walking distance to Barrhaven Centre, the Minto Recreational Centre, Oc Transpo bus stops and bus stations, as well as many schools and parks, this location is unbeatable.
With only a 15 minute drive to Kanata, a 25 minute drive to the Byward Market, and close proximity to the 416 highway, this house is situated in a great location.
This property is greatly suitable for professionals/military families as it is within 15 minutes to the DND facility.
The rent is 2450 per month, and tenants are responsible for all utilities, as well as lawn cutting and snow removal.

Minimum one-year lease, with first & last month's rent required at time of lease agreement signing. Should you be interested in renting, all agreements to leasing must be accompanied by a rental application, a credit check, and references.
We are available for showings this Thursday, August 6th between 1PM - 8PM. Please let us know if you would like to schedule an appointment for a viewing.
Thank you,

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

Building Overview

This nice heritage apartment building named Traymore, located in Sandy Hill (Downtown), features unfurnished bachelor, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, available on long term basis.

Our apartment provides amenities such as kitchen, fridge, oven, stove, WIFI (35$ extra a month), parking (100$ dollar extra a month) and coin operated laundry machines located in a shared laundry room in the basement of the building. Hydro is not included 

It is well organized and suitable for families, students, tourists, budget travelers or people looking for accommodation on a long term basis.

Suite Features
These suites feature stainless steel kitchen appliances, a free-standing kitchen island, built-in USB chargers and a balcony or patio in most units.

Amenities & Services

  • Pet spa and dog run

  • Parcel storage

  • Guest suite

Location
LIV is ideally located in the heart of Ottawa, just steps to so many vibrant Ottawa communities. Little Italy, Chinatown, Glebe, Lansdowne and Centertown are a few blocks away with restaurants, delis, bakeries, pubs and shops. Take in the nightlife in the ByWard Market and Elgin Street. Bike, run or walk along the paths by the Ottawa River and Rideau Canal.

Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

The master bedroom contains a large window, large walk-in closet, and en-suite with full soaker tub/shower. The main bathroom upstairs also contains a full soaker tub/shower as well.
The finished basement also contains a warming fireplace. The unfinished area of the basement provides the washer and dryer as another section of the unfinished area contains tons of storage space.

This end unit town home also includes a single car garage with built in shelving, two additional parking spots in the lane way, lawnmower, central air conditioning and a specious interlock pad for a private outdoor retreat. Front yard will be landscaped in the near future.

Located in a quiet enclave in the heart of Westboro, with a 3-minute walk to Dominion LRT Station, shops and restaurants. Short stroll to the Ottawa River pathway system. Built by Uniform Urban Developments as part of “The Exchange”, this 2100 sq ft, 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath, luxury townhouse is ideal for the busy family, executive or diplomat.

Excellent floor plan with large Den/Home Office/Gym/Yoga Studio and inside entry to double-car garage on the ground floor. Spacious master bedroom with walk-in closet and incredible 4-piece ensuite bathroom with double sinks, granite countertop, heated floor and custom shower with dual Hansgrohe fixture. Beautiful main bath has luxurious deep soaker tub with custom tile surround, quartz counter, heated floors and trough sink.
Newly installed carpet, furnace & hot water tank. Modern LED lighting and freshly painted in warm neutral colours throughout.
$4200/month.
Minimum 1-year lease. Multi-year lease available. *Rent includes electricity, natural gas heat, water & sewer and snow removal.*

1445,1503612360.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/excellent-kanata-lakes-3-bedrooms-semi-detached/1503612360,", k2t 1a1, kanata, ON",ontario,45.30882,-75.89868,2150.0,,"***Still available if ad is visible thanks!!

Freshly painted, beautiful and bright 2+1 bedroom 2 baths semi-detached home located in Kanata Lakes across from great family park with extra-large, fenced yard. Attached single garage and driveway allows parking for three vehicles!

Well laid-out main floor features gleaming hardwood and tile throughout with carpeted bedrooms. Upgraded kitchen with new smooth top range and hood fan, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher including plenty of storage and eat in counter space. Expansive dining and living areas complete the plan with natural light from good-sized windows.

At the back of the house, overlooking a serene backyard is the private master bedroom that includes two closets (one walk in closet and one in wall closet). A second bedroom and large full bath with walk in shower awaits your enjoyment!

The finished walkout basement has 9’ ceilings. Here you will find a giant recreation room with cozy gas fireplace, 3rd bedroom looking out into the private yard and second four-piece bath. A laundry room with washer/dryer set and inside garage entry round out the floor.

Perfectly situated within steps of Kanata high tech park, top schools (Stephen Leacock, Earl of March, All Saints, Holy Trinity), Richcraft recreation complex, trails, shops and restaurants, public transit and with easy access to the 417. Equipped with central air conditioning.
$2,150/month. Tenants pay all utilities (electricity, gas, water/sewer, hot water tank rental, internet etc.) and are responsible for lawn mowing and snow removal.
Reference and credit check required.

1450,1515636350.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/sadlers-court-apartments-1-bedroom-apartment-for-rent/1515636350,"67 Cartier St., Ottawa, ON, K2P 1J6",ontario,45.4179512,-75.6875833,1350.0,,"

Large 1 bedroom with no balcony. 



Available September or October 1. 



Building Overview

Welcome to the Sadler's Court Apartments! 67 Cartier is ideally located in Ottawa's Golden Triangle, where you'll find yourself nestled in a quiet, residential neighbourhood, yet just steps from the lively Elgin Street. 67 Cartier Street is a mid-ride 10-storey apartment building offering large and spacious bachelors, one and two bedroom apartments.

This building is ideal for students and professionals. You are just steps away from the Somerset walking bridge that brings you right to University of Ottawa campus. The City Hall and many office buildings are just minutes walking distance away from your doorstep. You are also within walking distance to Ottawa's new LRT Parliament Station. You can enjoy all the trendy shops, bars, restaurants, and coffee shops this neighbourhood has to offer!

Our listings are available for September 1, 2020.

It comes with all the perks: large bay windows, wood working fireplace, three bathrooms, jacuzzi tub, etc.
It is very elegant and well maintained in an exclusive low rise condo building, close to Dow's lake.
The condo comes fully furnished and equipped. All you need to bring is your personal belongings.
The building is very selective: it accepts only families or people who are somehow related to each other.
The neighborhood is quiet and friendly. It is close to parks and green space with lots of outdoors activities.
It is a short walk to the Civic Hospital, Dow's lake or Little Italy.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Welcome home to CLV Group's beachfront community, Britannia Beachfront Apartment and Homes. Situated in the west end of Ottawa, these two communities have undergone extensive renovations in order to bring you the high CLV Group standards you have come to expect and enjoy. From updated kitchens and bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, upgraded common areas and a fresh exterior, you will be proud to call Britannia Beachfront your new home!

OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's West End neighbourhood, Britannia Beachfront Apartments & Homes offers newly updated suites. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River from their backyards, relax under the sun at Britannia Beach and take a stroll at neighbouring Britannia Park.

Our excellent Britannia Beach neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Bayshore Shopping Centre, Coliseum Movie Theatre, Farm Boy and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Britannia Beachfront Apartments & Homes is the perfect place for you to call home!

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

1496,1515570367.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/incredible-super-house-2-units-separate-under-one-roof-price/1515570367,", Greely K4P1A7 ON, Canada",ontario,45.2589025,-75.5655192,3499.0,,"See every detail floor plans, virtual tour ++ at http://www.1421darcy.com
Either Multi-generational house, or friends in separate units under a single roof. In demand arrangement.
The main house sits on 1/2 acre of land in quiet Greely Central. What follows is 2 separate units each around 1900 sq. ft., and each very unique.
One traditional 3 bedroom, the other open concept 2 bedroom + den/rec.
Shared front door, separate units from inside grand hall.
Stepping into the main house, (there is way more) you are greeted by India Slate entrance way.
Granite, Spanish tiles, feature after feature. The main Bathroom have everything you want plus more, 6 piece, including bidets on a ceramic floors.
Follow in one unit with 99"" extra high ceilings and an open concept layout. Bright natural light.

More then 2.5 bathrooms. The main Bathroom has the usual plus: double sinks, separate 5 head shower and Roman spa tub, super mirror and a bidet, all on lovely Spanish tile floor. The 2-piece powder room has lots of storage.
An open concept kitchen, with a main island to cook and eat. Granite and Steel, with bottom freezer 22cubic, Jennair gas top stove, built in oven and Microwave and dishwasher.
There is a billiard table, in addition to the already large, dining and living room space. Awesome wood fireplace complete with heatilator.
The master and other bedrooms are larger then expected, each, fully closeted, carpet. Washer/dryer in the Gym/Den. Wine cellar and pantry area tucked away.
Unit 2 is traditional. 3 bedroom, huge kitchen, dining, and living rooms (hardwood floor), Travertine countertop, Deep soaker tub, bidet, floor to ceiling windows. Private elevated back deck.
Out back there is so much more:
- 18x36 in-ground pool,
- Diving board and slides as well as
- In ground hot tub and an
- Amazing, pool house/cabana.
- Fully enclosed private large yard, and
Superb neighborhood close enough to the city, yet great for outdoors fresh air, star gazing, bicycle rides etc.
2 garages everything larger then life. Driveway parking fits 9. Garage fit 2 cars plus Bike/ATV etc.
- Under 28 minutes to most points in city
- Under 13 minutes to South Keys (all kinds of shopping)
- Under 10 minutes to Findley Creek and many (increasing) retail, food, etc.
- 3 minutes to large Foodland, Dollarama
- 3 minutes to the neighborhood public library
- 5 golf courses, just minutes away

Consider Artista Flats, located at 341 Flora St in Ottawa's Centretown neighbourhood, the solution for young professionals and students who desire the comforts of home, with the accessibility to the downtown core. Designed in modern and upscale style, the clean, spacious and comfortable Artista Flats is quickly becoming a sought after address for Ottawa's up-and-coming.

At Artista Flats we pride ourselves in providing everything the university student or young professional may need. Featuring renovated and pet friendly one-bedroom floor plan designs, Artista Flats is a place you'll be proud to call home.

Sitting a stroll away from the ultra-trendy Glebe and Elgin St area, Artista Flats is connected to businesses, government centres, schools, outdoor recreation, shopping, dining and entertainment. Conveniently located for students, Artista Flats is just a short walk to Carleton University and University of Ottawa. In short, you can have anything you want, and more!

Ideal for university students and young professionals, at the pet friendly 197 Cumberland we offer clean and upscale bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments.

Come visit us at 197 Cumberland and you'll discover how enticing downtown life can be.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

Welcome to 1276 Dorchester, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our pet friendly and spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments were recently upgraded to include, ceramic tiling in the bathroom and kitchen, hardwood in the living room and bedroom, new countertops, vanities, fixtures, lighting and appliances.

There is no cost to apply and this pre-approval does not commit you to renting the property, since you will have the right to accept or refuse after viewing.

If you are interested in viewing or applying, please either contact our office by email at rentals@pmamanagement.com or download a rental application from our website at http://www.pmamanagement.com/rentals/index.php

200 Rideau, Claridge Plaza. Within the very heart of the city is this striking new landmark address featuring two contemporary 24-storey towers, each beautifully detailed with pre-cast concrete and tinted glass. Breathtaking views in every direction including the Parliament Buildings, the Gatineau Hills, Rideau Hall, the Ottawa River and the Canal. Steps away from Ottawa's best shopping and cultural destinations, including the Byward Market, the Rideau Centre, NAC and the National Art Gallery.

The Plaza Club is a fabulous 8,000 sq. fl. recreation centre located on the top level of the building podium, featuring an indoor swimming pool, sauna, fitness facilities, a private lounge in which to gather with your friends and neighbours, as well as nearly 4,500 sq. fl. of landscaped terraces on the north and south side of the Club. A grand two-storey lobby with an entrance off Rideau Street and manned by a 24-hour concierge. Three high-speed elevators in each tower as well as private and secure underground parking.

Unit features 1 bedroom, one bathroom and 6 appliances, fridge, stove, dishwasher, microwave, washer and dryer. Mixed flooring throughout. Balcony. Parking is not included with the rental of this unit (however, public lot behind the building does rent parking spaces).

Heating charges are included in the monthly rent, but tenants are responsible for their hydro charges. Non-Smokers & Prefer No Pets.

To arrange a viewing appointment, please call PMA at 613-742-5778 and press ""1"" for rentals, any weekday between 8:30 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. (4:00 p.m. on Fridays). Appointments may take place during the daytime, early evening or on Saturdays, but all must be booked during office hours.

For information regarding the status of this rental, to view the availability date and to see a list of all our available properties, please use the View Website link above in our contact information.

Welcome to 45 Somerset, located in Ottawa's trendy Centretown neighbourhood. This three-story walk-up building offers spacious bachelors and 1 bedroom apartments with freshly painted walls, recently renovated bathrooms and three appliance kitchens. The building is complete with on-site laundry facilities, parking, a fitness center, and secure entranceways.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to one of Ottawa's trendiest districts! Rosebery Apartments is located in the heart of the Glebe, attracting young professionals who desire the comforts of home (without the burden of upkeep and maintenance), but need the accessibility to Ottawa's downtown core. Done in a trendy retro brick-storefront design, Rosebery Apartments is quickly becoming a desired address for Ottawa's up-and-coming.

This four storey walk-up building offers spacious one and two bedroom apartments with renovated cherry cabinet kitchens, large bright windows, and hardwood flooring throughout. Rosebery Apartments is a place you'll be proud to call home!

Rosebery Apartments are conveniently located in the heart of the Glebe just off of Bank Street. These Ottawa rental apartments are only 10 minutes from Parliament Hill and Rideau Center and are close to all amenities including Carleton University, Lansdowne Park, and many more popular restaurants, shops and parks. Commutes to work and school are also made easy due to the building's proximity to the Highway 417 and public transportation.

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

Our recently renovated 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, updated countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites are ideal for students, couples, young professionals and retirees who are looking for a quiet place to call home with easy access to amenities and attractions..

1196 Shillington is steps from Ottawa's Experimental Farm where you can enjoy beautiful gardens, paths and more. The building's close proximity to Carling Ave and Merivale Rd provides for access to numerous public parks, shopping, grocery, medical facilities and schools. SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Avalon Park offers a welcoming escape from the city with high-end amenities in a park-like setting, all just minutes from Elmvale Shopping Centre and Highway 417. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. Enjoy amenities like an outdoor pool, plenty of green space, a theatre room and much more.

SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Avalon Park has it all, location, convenience and high-end amenities.

Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

Call 613-454-5781 today to schedule your private tour.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

The 3500 sq. ft interior is a custom built dwelling that provides tenants with lavish living spaces, a unique design and high end finishes.

The main living area features walnut/maple hardwood floors, new windows (throughout) and a wood burning fireplace/chimney.

Riviera Apartmentsis conveniently surrounded by amenities such schools, parks, medical facilities, restaurants, and shopping. Riviera makes for an ideal place to live with close proximity to Highway 14, allowing for an easy commute to Gatineau - Hull and Ottawa. The Rideau Centre is a quick and easy bus ride away on STO #1. Les Appartements Rivieras sont situés à une courte distance du centre-ville d'Ottawa et du complexe Place du Portage - idéale pour les professionnels qui veulent un court trajet au travail. Grâce à leur emplacement pratique en plein coeur d'Aylmer, les Appartements Riviera sont procheà la Marina d'Aylmer et lesboutiques et restaurants tout le long de la rue Principale.

Ces suites spacieuses nouvellement rénovés présentent des planchers de céramique et de bois franc, de nouveaux luminaires, une peinture de conception deux tons et bien plus encore.

Parmi les nombreuses commodités et caractéristiques recherchés, mentionnons:

  • Appareils électroménagers compris
  • Ascenseurs dans tous les édifices
  • Services publiques compris
