1667,1515226409.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/500sqft-studio-tribeca-east-best-downtown-ottawa-condo/1515226409,"40 Nepean St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0X4, Canada",ontario,45.4190785,-75.69315499999999,1900.0,,"If you like a great location and awesome amenities this place is for you. I love my condo and am looking for a renter who will love the space as much as me!
--About The Unit--

The unit is 3 years old on the 24th floor of the Tribeca East building and boasts 5 large floor-to-ceiling windows. It comes with awesome black-out blinds that will make it nighttime in the day time and let lovely light in when you want it. While the unit faces the building across (west-facing windows with lots of sunshine!), it is high up enough to have a beautiful view of the financial district from the north and glebe from the south. It's move-in ready when you are!

Yes, it is a studio apartment; the kitchen, living, and bedroom are in one continuous space. The unit is 500 square feet and has a great floorplan that makes the bedroom - while in the continuous space - still separate from the living room and kitchen. There are stainless steel kitchen appliances, granite countertops, and hardwood floors.

The Internet is included. No utilities. No parking (but you won't need it with all the great walking distance places!). IN-SUITE laundry. The unit comes furnished (But no TV! A universal TV mount is there and available for your use) but we can talk about alternatives. The unit will be professionally washed prior to move in!
--About The Building--

I've listed the great amenities of the unit on the ad, have a look. There’s a gym, 24-hour security, concierge, storage locker included, and meeting rooms and guest rooms at an extra fee to the condo board. The building is also managed using an app so if there are any maintenance requests for the condo board’s attention, they can be set up there. This is also how the condo board communicates with you.
--About The Location--
With Farmboy and Rexall just downstairs, the building is a five-ten minute walk to Parliament Station (OTrain), Elgin Street, Financial District, parks, museums, landmarks!
--To Set Up a Viewing--
Given the COVID-19 situation, I am happy to send you a video walk-through of the unit if you are interested. We can talk about the next steps from there. Safety first!
--To Apply--
Please keep in mind that I am looking for someone interested in a one-year lease, moving in September 1, 2020. I can arrange for earlier as well.
Application Form
* Please ask for an application form and submit to me along with the below
Proof of Finances
* Must provide proof of employment (Employment agreement and reference)
* Must provide last two pay stubs
Credit Check
* Must provide credit check (Credit Karma, Equifax, etc.)
References
* Must provide a character reference
* Must provide a past landlord reference",Yes,1,Bachelor/Studio,Owner,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,1 Year,0,No,No,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,No,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,Yes,Yes,,,Condo,,,,

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to the heart of one of Ottawa's most bustling districts! At 212-216 Bank Street, not only can you flourish in style, but you are a short skip away from the most dynamic section of downtown. Ideal for university students and young professionals, our trendy walk-up offers clean and upscale bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments and 3 bedroom apartments. Our historic red-brick storefront presence distinguishes our pet friendly spot, and the convenience of our Centretown location makes 212-216 Bank Street an address that you will love to call home.

Relax at home or take a stroll around the neighbourhood and discover what the most energetic streets of Ottawa have to offer. 212-216 Bank is located in the trendy Centertown neighbourhood of downtown Ottawa, between the banks of the historic and beautiful Ottawa River and Rideau Canal and just down the street from the trendy cobble stoned Sparks Street Promenade. Located just a short commute to Carleton University, the University of Ottawa, Parliament Hill and other trendy neighbourhoods like the ByWard Market, The Glebe and Elgin Street area.

…where you are currently living and what brings you to Ottawa

Building Overview

Welcome to the Acadian Apartments! Situated in between Bank and O'Connor, you will find yourself walking distance to just about anything you need. 153 Nepean consists of spacious bachelors, one and two bedroom apartments with balconies, hardwood floors, large windows and beautiful views of downtown Ottawa. Professionals and students like to call the Acadian Apartments their home, as it is a short commute to schools and universities, and many downtown offices. 

Centretown offers a variety of amenities including many restaurants, trendy shops, banks and many local cafes to choose from.You are just down the street from the trendy Sparks Street Promenade and situated just a short commute to many trendy neighbourhoods like the Byward Market, the Glebe and the lively Elgin Street. You are also within walking distance to Ottawa's new LRT Parliament Station. 

See below for more photos, floor plans and some virtual tours of our units. 

Our listings are only available for August, September or October move-ins. 

Please call Ray at 613-233-1320 to schedule an in-person viewing.

Avalon Park offers a welcoming escape from the city with high-end amenities in a park-like setting, all just minutes from Elmvale Shopping Centre and Highway 417. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. Enjoy amenities like an outdoor pool, plenty of green space, a theatre room and much more.

SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Avalon Park has it all, location, convenience and high-end amenities.

Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

1872,1513145422.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/female-roommate-wanted-westboro-fall-2020/1513145422,", Ottawa K1Z 5V3 ON, Canada",ontario,45.3955245,-75.7484074,975.0,,"*Please read everything below before messaging :) I know this is a long ad, but I’ve taken the time to include as many details as possible for those interested. Feel free to message if you have additional questions!*

I am a 30 year-old professional female looking for a roommate for the apartment I am currently in. Full-time professional females only please. The room will be available as of this fall. Let me know when you were looking to move, I’m relatively flexible.
The Room, Location, Etc:
One bedroom available in a two bedroom apartment in Westboro (near the Superstore, Richmond Rd/Kirkwood area).

UPDATE 1: The photos of the room with furniture are from a previous roommate to show scale, however my current roommate will likely be leaving/selling her desk/dresser/bed etc. so there might be a possibility of having furniture. Let me know if that's something you're interested in.

UPDATE 2: My landlord (who is great!), will be updating the shower/tub area of the bathroom with a Bath Fitter soon, so half the bathroom will be brand new (and installed quickly!)! The bathroom is already quite nice, but this a cool extra perk I thought I'd mention :)
- The room is fairly large measuring in at 11’11” x 11’2” with a large window and large closet
- The unit is on the main floor of a triplex
- The unit has one shared bathroom

- Street parking only, or if you wanted, there is a paid underground lot nearby (5 minute walk). There is no parking space available for you on the premises since I occupy the only space for the unit.
- Ideal for either someone who doesn't drive, OR works ~9-5 type of hours in order to avoid bylaw tickets during the weekdays (bylaw doesn’t patrol our street on weekends)
- 5 minute walk to Westboro bus station (OC Transpo) which connects to LRT
- 2 minute walk to Superstore
- 5 minute walk to Farm Boy
- 3 minute drive to the highway on/off ramps
- Not a far walk or drive to Wellington West (Wellington Village), Hintonburg, Tunney’s Pasture, even downtown is a quick drive down Scott Street, the parkway, Richmond Rd, or the highway
- Air conditioning (central air)!
- Hardwood floors throughout
- Stainless steel kitchen appliances (dishwasher, fridge, stove)
- Nice natural light
- Coin-operated laundry in basement of building

- There is no storage available in or outside of the unit, so someone that doesn't have a ton of belongings is ideal since you'll be limited to the space in your room. (There is a den in the unit, but I use that room in its entirety and it is not available for your use. This is reflected in the price).
- No pets please
The neighbours on the street are close-knit, friendly, and family oriented. It's a warm, safe community.
The neighbours in our building are pleasant 20-30 somethings. I've been in this unit for 6 years and I've been very happy here.
About Me:

I'm a 30 year old woman who works from home most days as I run my own successful business of over 10 years. If you’re wondering what a roommate who works from home would be like, in my case I just work quietly between my desk in my room, and on my laptop in the living room (can’t sit in the same place all day haha).

I’m tidy, friendly, responsible, respectful, financially secure, tend to keep to myself but happy to watch some TV together, I don't party or have people over very often. I’ve had a few roommates over the years and they would all describe me as being very easy to live with. I can provide references if you like.
Looking For:

Looking for a roommate who is: a professional female ideally in the same age range (late 20's early 30's) who is responsible, friendly, quiet, and respectful. Since I work from home, I’d prefer a roommate who works outside of the home in a full time position.

Looking for someone who has all of the attributes one would want in a roommate: clean and tidy, cleans up after themselves especially in the kitchen, doesn’t leave clutter around, that kind of thing. I’d like someone who is quiet and doesn't play music or TV too loudly (the sound really carries).

I like to keep the apartment pretty quiet and peaceful, I wouldn’t want people coming in and out a lot. A couple friends over once in a while is perfect, but I wouldn’t want it to be a regular hang out spot.
I'm past the drinking/party phase of my life and looking for someone in the same boat.
Ideal roommate in a word? Chill. (Please, no drama or crazies, you know who you are haha).

You would pay me $975 on the 25th of each month and this covers all costs. Of course if the expenses change considerably, I would adjust this figure. However costs have stayed pretty consistent over the years so I don’t expect this to be an issue.

Being completely financially secure and able to pay on time every month is a must, which should go without saying. I don’t mess around with this, so if $975 sounds like it could be tight for you, this won’t be a good fit.
If you're interested, send me a message with some info about yourself! I will reply to those who seem like they could potentially be a good fit and we can go from there :)
Thanks all!",No,1,1,Owner,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,Month-to-month,0,No,No,No,No,No,Yes,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,No,,,Apartment,,,,

Located in trendy Hintonburg this 3 -bedroom apartment is a rare gem. Enjoy the convenience and lifestyle of being located steps away from Wellington street West.

This spacious 3-bedroom apartment includes a large living-dining room area and large windows throughout the apartment that allows for ample sun exposure year-round. The entire apartment is newly renovated with a brand-new kitchen with never before used Stainless Steel dishwasher, fridge, stove and microwave. Also, a completely new modern washroom with bathtub. The 3-bedroom space is ideal for a professional couple wanting extra space for a home office or can easily accommodate roommates. The building has on site laundry in newly renovated laundry room.

The area is highly walkable, scoring an 89 on the walk score index; and is walking distance from many cafes, restaurants and local grocery stores. We are also located walking distance from the Civic Hospital making it a great option for anyone working there. There is a communal bike rack located in the back of the apartment building. The area offers excellent access to bike trails along the Ottawa River and safe bike lanes throughout the streets making it an exciting option for cyclers (bike score of 94) The apartment includes use of 1 large garden box for those interested in gardening which has ample sunshine exposure and water access nearby. 1912,1514280709.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/sunny-cozy-2-br-apartment-1600-month/1514280709,", K1R 6P1, Ottawa, ON",ontario,45.40889869999999,-75.71624229999999,1600.0,,"Want to get ready for autumn by moving where all the action is? To move into your own place? Move in with your beau? Ditch the awful roomy? Move to the coolest of neighbourhoods? Impress your friends by being in the know for all the best restaurants and food stands in Centretown West/ Hintonburg?
This lovely, sunny, cozy 2 BR apartment is your answer! Available September 1st.
Located on the 2nd floor of a house, this place has TWO bedrooms that are pretty much the same size. No need to draw the short straw of who gets the tiny room.
Open concept kitchen, living room with south facing windows for all your sunshine needs in Ottawa’s dreary winter.

Not only do you get a great apartment, you also get your own front yard patio (not a balcony). The patio space is located on the ground level which means you can put a BBQ! Take that high-rise buildings!
Landlord lives next door, which is super convenient if Sunday eve at 8pm you have an apartment emergency. :-)
What else do you get in this unit?
· Hardwood throughout most of the unit, new carpet in one bedroom. Carpet is much nicer on the tootsies when you wake up in the morning!
· All old crappy windows replaced so you stay draft-free warm.
· Heat, water and hot water.
· A walkability index of 90 out of 100 which means you can pretty much walk anywhere you need.
· A bike score of 100 out of 100!!! Biker’s heaven!
· A transit score of 90 out of 100. Pretty dang awesome for Ottawa.
· This place is even in range of those new e-scooters -awww yeah!
· Close proximity (700m) to Lebreton Station and the new Confederation LRT Line for all your commuting needs.* (when it's running :S)

· Living a life that is far too close to delicious places such as Art-Is-In (200m), Bridgehead’s main roastery (280m), Ward 14 (240m) Peitro's Corner (110m), Pubwells (62m). Or go across the tracks to a plethora of restaurants).

· Burn all the good food off at Plant Recreation Centre (190m), the new O-Train Bike Paths, Ottawa River Bike Paths, Beaver Boxing (87m) or by walking through Chinatown, Little Italy, Hintonburg or to your downtown work or school.
What is extra?

· Hydro (aka electricity). How much is it a month? I really can’t say since I don’t know if you live by candle light and are never home or have 10 plasma TVs and never leave your apartment/ home office.
· Parking. Street parking is availble through the City.
No laundry on premises, although the previous tenant had an arrangement with the downstairs to do laundry in their unit.
Questions about pets? Let's chat. Totally cool with a goldfish, not so cool with a pit viper (Ottawa Bylaw agrees).
Message to schedule a viewing virtual or using ""fun"" pandemic approved socially distance measures

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Consider 447 Somerset, Ottawa's Centretown solution to young professionals and students who desire the comforts of home with the accessibility to our capital city. The modern, clean, spacious and comfortable 447 Somerset is quickly becoming a desired address for Ottawa's up-and-coming lifestyle.

At 447 Somerset, we pride ourselves in providing everything the university student or young professional may need. This quiet, four storey walk-up features bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments, 3 bedroom apartments and 4 bedroom apartments with various floor plan designs.

Quiet and unassumingly trendy, 447 Somerset sits in the middle of Ottawa's Centretown neighbourhood and is conveniently located to local businesses, government centres, schools, shopping, dining and entertainment. A short walk takes you to popular neighbourhoods like the Glebe and Little Italy, and the building's close proximity to public transportation and Highway 417 also makes for convenient commutes to school or work across the city.

Apartment 34 A Bolton Street, Ottawa ON K1N 5A9
Available summer 2020: One-bedroom, one-bathroom, 570 sq. ft. apartment

Located in the basement level of a character home on the quiet side of the ByWard market, this apartment has newly renovated kitchen and bathroom, hardwood floors throughout and laundry facilities on-site. Across from the Royal Canadian Mint, this spot is ideal for the urban professional who loves being where the action is — art galleries, coffee shops and exquisite bakeries, diverse restaurants, and shopping galore! Enjoy walking to the many events scheduled downtown in our nation’s capital, year-round!

Welcome to the trendy, urban setting that is 214 Metcalfe. Located in the middle of Ottawa's Centertown core, these rental apartments offer a variety of nearby shops, restaurants and nightlife on both Elgin St and Bank St. Just a short distance from Parliament Hill, University of Ottawa and an array of national museums and galleries.

This one bedroom apartment is renovated and spacious, making it the perfect place to call home.

Welcome to 235 Charlotte located in the heart of Sandy Hill, one of Ottawa's trendiest neighbourhoods! Not only will you be living in comfort at this newly renovated neo-Victorian styled building, but you are steps away from the most exciting amenities around town. This location is ideal because of the clean and upscale heritage-style bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. 

Located in Sandy Hill, right along the banks of the historic and beautiful Rideau River, this peaceful location has been discovered by students and young professionals. 235 Charlotte is a convenient walk to the internationally-acclaimed University of Ottawa, and the ByWard Market. Museums, cafes, and boutiques are all a part of what makes the ByWard Market a trendy destination. The market's restaurants, pubs and nightclubs provide a variety of international cuisine, social excitement and late night dancing and music.

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

Welcome to 1196 Shillington, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our recently renovated 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, updated countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites are ideal for students, couples, young professionals and retirees who are looking for a quiet place to call home with easy access to amenities and attractions..

1196 Shillington is steps from Ottawa's Experimental Farm where you can enjoy beautiful gardens, paths and more. The building's close proximity to Carling Ave and Merivale Rd provides for access to numerous public parks, shopping, grocery, medical facilities and schools. Highway 417 is a short drive away and public transportation is just steps from your front door.

The Rideau Canal is a beautiful walk or short drive away where you can find waterside restaurants and cafes. 1196 Shillington is conveniently located between Carleton University and Algonquin College, great for students looking for a quick and easy commute to campus.

column3: I offer spectacular quiet rooms for students or young professionals— whether quiet, humming lightly or truly dynamic—to fit your style or your mood.

Your safety is paramount. My security cameras and 24/7 staff on site make me a very secure residence, without ever intruding on your privacy.
We got you covered! Printers and pods on site

Building Overview

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

This nice heritage apartment building named Traymore, located in Sandy Hill (Downtown), features unfurnished bachelor, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, available on long term basis.

Our apartment provides amenities such as kitchen, fridge, oven, stove, WIFI (35$ extra a month), parking (100$ dollar extra a month) and coin operated laundry machines located in a shared laundry room in the basement of the building. Hydro is not included 

It is well organized and suitable for families, students, tourists, budget travelers or people looking for accommodation on a long term basis.
The closest intersection is Laurier Av and King Edward Ave.

Clean, stylish and newly renovated apartments located in this heritage building in Sandy Hill will suit your needs.

The condo features hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Underground parking is available with most units. This building does not feature storage lockers. Enjoy beautiful Ottawa sunsets and summer BBQ’s on the spacious rooftop terrace, a common space for all residents. The condo is located on the 4th floor of a new 5 storey building.
Centropolis Condo is located in Centretown.

This area is conveniently nestled between Bronson St. and Elgin St. and is in close proximity to the Hwy 417. The downtown sector is 15 minutes from Ottawa International Airport, 10 minutes from the VIA Rail train station and 5 minutes from Ottawa’s Greyhound Station.

The hustle and bustle of business during the day is complemented by calm evenings. Nightlife isn’t far however, as Elgin St. and the Byward Market feature a wide array of restaurants and bars open late. Fine dining is prevalent in the area, including some of Ottawa’s best steakhouses and seafood eateries.

Cultured palettes will find thrill knowing Ottawa’s Chinatown and Little Italy are also nearby. This area also is home to many international grocery stores as well as local names. Shopping enthusiasts are close to The Rideau Centre and many boutiques. Centretown features Canadian culture as one of its main highlights. The National Arts Centre is home to some of the best performances, seminars, and exhibitions.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

At 475 & 485 King Edward you can not only manage your life in upscale heritage style, but you are also right around the corner from the most dynamic section of downtown and the University of Ottawa. At 475 & 485 King Edward we offer heritage style 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. The convenience of our downtown location makes 475 & 485 King Edward an address that you will love calling home.

Located in Sandy Hill of downtown Ottawa, just a few blocks from the Rideau Canal, young professionals and adults are drawn to the area because of its easy access to the most exciting attractions in town. Students love the building because of its location just down the street from the University of Ottawa and minutes from the ByWard Market, home to a variety of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 475 & 485 King Edward and see how exciting downtown life can be!

Here's a modern and beautiful (unfurnished) 3 bedroom end-unit townhouse for rent with finished basement in the South Nepean - Barrhaven area. Has a total of 3 washrooms (one is a powder room).

Location is ideal in beautiful Nepean at the border of Barrhaven and Nepean. Perfect location! This home is across the street from a park making it great for your kids and pets alike. There are 6 parks all within 10 minutes walking area. 7 minutes walk from St Andrew school, 4 minutes walk from Farley Mowat school, and others. 3 minutes drive to FreshCo, Tim Hortons and Starbucks (15 minute walk), 9 minutes drive from Stoneridge golf course. Minutes from the airport. This location has all the amenities you'll need nearby!

On the main floor you'll find a foyer with a lockable door leading to the garage to your left and a door leading to the powder room to your right. Further down the hall, you will find a separated dinning area. The kitchen too is separated and has dark colored cabinetry and backsplash giving it a modern look that compliments the modern appliances well. The demarcated living room features a fireplace and windows to brighten the room.

The main floor also has a walk out to a fenced backyard with deck for BBQs and lounging on summer days. Like gardening? The backyard has some gardening space should you have a green thumb, yet just enough that you won't have to do too much mowing.
Master bedroom is on the top floor. It comes equiped with an ensuite washroom that has both a shower and a tub. This room also has a walk in closet for your large collection of fashionable items.
The top floor also has two other rooms.
Laundry room is on this floor as well. This allows the person occupying the basement some privacy, should you decide to use the basement as a guest room.
Lower floor of the home has finished basement that can be used as a storage space, a family room, a guest room or a recreation room.

There's an attached garage that is big enough for a large sized car and driveway that fits two extra vehicles. There's a park a really short walk just across the street. Costco is just 4 minutes drive away.

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options. 

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 57 Bayswater in Hintonburg, Ottawa! Nestled in the centre of Hintonburg, our trendy and creative community is home to students, professionals and families who enjoy being close to all the opportunities Hintonburg has to offer!

HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood, we offer:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments, gorgeous views from private balconies, laminate and ceramic flooring throughout, on-site laundry and fitness facility and easy access to public transportation and biking trails. All of these features and a winning location in the middle of vibrant neighbourhood make 57 Bayswater the perfect place to live.

Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.

Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.

Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!

Welcome to 217 Laurier located in Ottawa's Sandy Hill neighbourhood. Ideal for university students and young professionals, at 217 Laurier we offer clean and spacious bachelor, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom, 3 bedroom and 4 bedroom apartments. Our historic red-brick and ivy covered presence distinguishes our pet friendly spot, and the convenience of our downtown location makes 217 Laurier an address that you will be proud to call home.

Sandy Hill is located between the beautiful Rideau River and Rideau Canal, offering residents a variety of amenities just minutes away. Enjoy all the shops, boutiques and restaurants the Rideau Centre and ByWard Market have to offer.

Come visit us at 217 Laurier and find your next home.

column1: 2315,1511646842.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/199-slater-street-downtown-ottawa-1-bedroom-apartment-for-rent/1511646842,"199 Slater St., Ottawa, ON K1P 0A6, Canada",ontario,45.4199156,-75.69896609999999,1800.0,,"The condo unit is located on Slater, between Bank and Metcalfe Street on the 19th floor with an open view facing West. It is available for rent as of August 1, 2020 and onwards.

COVID-19 has transformed our way of life. An increasing risk exists with commuting on public transit and the need for convenient access to needs-based facilities becomes ever so important. Reconsider the risk of shared apartment/housing with roommates.

This condo offers a secure, private and safe place for a potential tenant to work and/or study. The condo is in the heart of Ottawa’s downtown and commercial district area, and is 5 minutes away to Parliament and 15 minutes away to University of Ottawa by foot. In addition, you will have access to clinics, pharmacies, supermarkets, coffee shops, LCBO and malls all within nearby radius. Moreover, the building is only 3 years old!
The main doors are locked at all times and can only be opened using a buzzer and/or a fob key. There are cameras on the main level as well as in the elevators.

For condo amenities, the building has an indoor group-size theatre, a game room, a hot tub, a gym, and a party room. There is free public parking in front of the building after 5 PM on weekdays and at all times on weekends. Bike parking can be included with this condo (if requested). Pets and smoking are not permitted.
The condo is currently furnished with one (1) Queen size bed, and two (2) Corporate Black Leola Chairs that can be turned each into a single bed. Furniture can be removed if preferred.
Important Rules

Due to COVID-19, some facilities listed above might be tentatively restricted or closed (i.e. public amenities and local outside-the-condo facilities). The following items will be required of the tenant before signing of the lease agreement: proof of income, reference required, credit report, minimum one (1) year lease (longer lease preferred), and first and last month rent deposit upon signing. At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

2350,1505837499.0,https://www.kijiji.ca/v-apartments-condos/ottawa/avalon-park:-apartment-for-rent-in-southeast-ottawa/1505837499,"2470 Southvale Crescent, Ottawa, ON, K1B 4L9",ontario,45.39833925902429,-75.61588618487548,1420.0,,"Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.  

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Avalon Park offers a welcoming escape from the city with high-end amenities in a park-like setting, all just minutes from Elmvale Shopping Centre and Highway 417. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. Enjoy amenities like an outdoor pool, plenty of green space, a theatre room and much more.

SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Avalon Park has it all, location, convenience and high-end amenities.

Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

Call 613-454-5781 today to schedule your private tour.

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Whatever your desire is, Britannia Parkside is the perfect place to call home!

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

Welcome to 217 Laurier located in Ottawa's Sandy Hill neighbourhood. Ideal for university students and young professionals, at 217 Laurier we offer clean and spacious bachelor, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom, 3 bedroom and 4 bedroom apartments. Our historic red-brick and ivy covered presence distinguishes our pet friendly spot, and the convenience of our downtown location makes 217 Laurier an address that you will be proud to call home.

Sandy Hill is located between the beautiful Rideau River and Rideau Canal, offering residents a variety of amenities just minutes away. Enjoy all the shops, boutiques and restaurants the Rideau Centre and ByWard Market have to offer.

Come visit us at 217 Laurier and find your next home.

Welcome to 288 Byron, located in Ottawa's trend-setting neighborhood of Westboro. Our pet friendly one and two bedroom apartments are sought after by the area's up-and-coming young professionals. Byron offers on-site laundry facilities, secure entranceways and 24-hour emergency service for residents.

Westboro Village boasts some of the trendiest boutiques and is home to chic, award winning restaurants and lounges that rival some of the best in the country. Enjoy all the amenities, services, and unique festivals the neighbourhood has to offer, like Westfest, Parkdale Farmer's Market, Baker Street Cafe, Starbucks, and more.

Take a break from bustling Westboro Village by heading over to Westboro Beach to enjoy some sun, or go for a stroll, run or bike along the Sir John A. Macdonald Parkway. Commutes to work or school are made easy with Byron's close proximity to public transportation and Highway 417.

Welcome to 57 Bayswater in Hintonburg, Ottawa! Nestled in the centre of Hintonburg, our trendy and creative community is home to students, professionals and families who enjoy being close to all the opportunities Hintonburg has to offer!

HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood, we offer:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments, gorgeous views from private balconies, laminate and ceramic flooring throughout, on-site laundry and fitness facility and easy access to public transportation and biking trails. All of these features and a winning location in the middle of vibrant neighbourhood make 57 Bayswater the perfect place to live.

Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.

Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.

Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!

Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.

Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.

Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!

At the pet friendly 180 Beausoleil, not only can you bask in affordable style, but you are a step away from the most dynamic section of downtown Ottawa. Ideal for university students and young professionals, 180 Beausoleil offers clean and upscale bachelor and 1 bedroom apartments. Our quiet, downtown Ottawa apartments are distinguishable by our convenient location that you will be proud to call home. 

180 Beausoleil is located in the trendy and bustling North Sandy Hill/Rideau Centre neighbourhood of downtown Ottawa. We are just a few minutes walk from the beautiful Rideau River, the acclaimed University of Ottawa, and Ottawa's well-known Byward Market and Rideau Centre. Enjoy a variety of nearby amenities including museums, cafes, restaurants, shops, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 180 Beausoleil and you'll discover how enticing downtown life can be.

Relax in your spacious apartment with private balcony, floors above Gloucester and experience the satisfaction and convenience of living at 860 Blackthorne in Ottawa, ON! Ideally located near Highway 417 and Aviation Parkway, 860 Blackthorne offers not only easy access around town but to the big city delights of Ottawa as well.

GLOUCESTER OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood we also offer:

Newly renovated apartments with laminate flooring, modern kitchen cabinets, stainless steel appliances including dishwashers, private balconies and dazzling views of the city. Take in the beautiful scenery with several nearby parks and walking paths or enjoy the many nearby entertainment venues.

When you make your home at 860 Blackthorne, you gain access to all of the dining, shopping and entertainment choices Gloucester has to offer. We have five parks within minutes of our front entrance, several shopping malls to select from and even an outdoor ice skating rink down the road.

We invite you to view our floor plans and experience 860 Blackthorne for yourself. Call 613-518-1095 today for a tour!

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

CENTRETOWN OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Besides one of the best addresses in downtown living, 218 MacLaren also provides:

Bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments. Newly painted apartments with laminate floors, convenient parking, and on-site laundry facilities.

At 218 MacLaren, your options are endless. Best of all is that everything you need is within walking distance from our front doors. Consider 447 Somerset, Ottawa's Centretown solution to young professionals and students who desire the comforts of home with the accessibility to our capital city. The modern, clean, spacious and comfortable 447 Somerset is quickly becoming a desired address for Ottawa's up-and-coming lifestyle.

At 447 Somerset, we pride ourselves in providing everything the university student or young professional may need. This quiet, four storey walk-up features bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments, 3 bedroom apartments and 4 bedroom apartments with various floor plan designs.

Welcome to 1073 Hollington, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our spacious and recently renovated bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, new countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all seeking the convenience of city life and the comfort of home.

These apartments are in a convenient community located just two blocks from Ottawa's Central Experimental Farm acreage. The farm provides incredible green space along with paths that are great for walking or biking. At 1073 Hollington, you have easy access to a selection of public parks, grocery, shopping, dining, medical facilities, and schools. Public transportation is steps away and only a short drive to Highway 417, making your commute to work, school or nearby attractions easy and convenient.

Arbor Village is a perfect location for students given its close proximity to Carleton University and Algonquin College. Only a short distance away is the beautiful Rideau Canal where you can enjoy a stroll along the paths, take in the scenic views during a bike ride or take advantage of the green space for a relaxing afternoon in the summer.

Paramount Property is a family run business celebrating 30 years of service this year and we are looking for a new member to join!!

POSITION:
Live-In Building Superintendent
Full-time position commencing as soon as possible
Rate of Pay $26,000.00 - $30,000/ year, apartment provided and utilities covered, basic cable and parking also included.
Health benefits after 3 months.
40 Hours per week

Job Description

To perform all Superintendent duties for high-rise apartment building. The position is responsible for all repairs assigned by the Property Manager.

These tasks include:
Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on heating, cooling and ventilation systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on plumbing systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on electrical systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on appliances, Paint, Repair drywall, Perform routine maintenance jobs and repairs, Work with minimal supervision

Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time Days, Rotating On Call/ Weekend schedules- All work on the 1st of the month!

Work Conditions and Physical Capabilities: Work under pressure, Physically demanding, Bending, crouching, kneeling
MUST HAVE OWN SET OF TOOLS & Safety footwear. Uniforms & coats provided

If you feel that this is a position for you we would love to meet with you.
Contact us via kijiji or email your resume directly to us at pow3@paramountapts.com
Criminal Background check will be conducted.
